# UIPointerEffect.TintMode.overlay

**Case**

The view has a tint overlay.

## Declaration

```swift
case overlay
```

## Tint Modes

- **UIPointerEffect.TintMode.none**: The view has no tint applied.
- **UIPointerEffect.TintMode.underlay**: The view has a tint underlay.
